name: KuKu Duel Lite - Fun 2 Player Game
name_original: KuKu Duel Lite - Fun 2 Player Game
description:
How good is your color vision?
more addicting than Candy Crush!
Challenge friends and test the quality of your color vision.

Tap on the tile which is not the same color with the other tiles.
For every correct answer you get +1 score
For every wrong answer you get -1 score

Thank you for your support and suggestions. Please rate us!
